phrs.translation: 剪切器, 单扣代购官方旗舰店

sentences.sentence: Then the shearers all sat silent till a man in the corner rose;
sentences.translation: 剪毛工都静默坐着直到角落有人站起来；

sentences.sentence: Even as sheep before their shearers are dumb, so they were not permitted to open their mouths.
sentences.translation: 绵羊在剪刀面前是不声不响的，因此他们也不得开口说话。

sentences.sentence: It has tnade a good results to use the techniques on the shearers and in the heading faces in coal underground.
sentences.translation: 并将此技术用于煤矿井下采煤机和炮掘工作面，取得了很好的降尘效果。
